mapper.sql: SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, employee_id AS employeeId, title, content, view_cnt, mod_date, reg_date FROM notice
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} and employee_id = #{employeeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, content, employee_id) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{employeeId})
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, title, content, employee_id, view_cnt, mod_date, reg_date FROM notice ORDER BY reg_date DESC, notice_id DESC

choose.otherwise: AND (title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select:
SELECT notice_id, title, content, employee_id, view_cnt, mod_date, reg_date FROM notice WHERE true
ORDER BY reg_date DESC, notice_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM notice WHERE true
